name: Apple Rascal
description:
Do you like games with (literally) tons of apples? or stealth games? or just games in general?

Try this and fall in love! But be careful to not get shot by an angry grandma, they don't fuck with you.

Requirements:
Any computer with graphics card higher than gtx460 or so.
Controls are all with keyboard. Mouse is needed for menus at the moment.
